meanings.definition: A flat surface in a kitchen or bathroom on which to work or place items.
meanings.sent1: The countertops in the kitchen are made of smooth granite.
meanings.sent2: I need to clean the countertops before preparing dinner.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat loves to jump on the countertops when no one is looking.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a cluttered mess, like a kitchen with disorganized countertops.
meanings.sent5: The sunlight gleamed off the sparkling countertops, making the whole room feel brighter.

meanings.definition: The top surface of a kitchen or bathroom cabinet.
meanings.sent1: She placed the vase on the countertops of the bathroom cabinet.
meanings.sent2: The countertops of the kitchen cabinet were scratched from years of use.
meanings.sent3: The tiny mouse peeked out from behind the countertops of the bathroom cabinet.
meanings.sent4: His thoughts were hidden away, like secrets stored beneath the countertops of the kitchen cabinet.
meanings.sent5: The countertops of the bathroom cabinet were so shiny, they reflected like a mirror.
